nodes.text: The ID10 seeker droid was a model of seeker droid that succeeded the ID9, with four legs instead of the ID9's five. Dio was an ID10 utilized by Inferno Squad following their formation after the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY.
Del Meeko repainted and repaired the droid when he and Iden Versio defected to the New Republic. Later on, Dio harbored the First Order Dreadnought blueprints given to the Resistance.
